attacks.name: Electromark
attacks.effect: Put a Shock-wave marker on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hyper Claws
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is a Stage 2 Evolved Pokémon, this attack does 70 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Shock-wave
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon that has any Shock-wave markers on it. That Pokémon is Knocked Out.
